body.p: On February 5 and 6, FSFE will be present at FOSDEM in ULB Campus Solbosch, Brussels, Belgium. Like every year, we're looking forward to many great meetings and discussions, and a very good time for all. FSFE will share its booth with the GNU project. Karsten Gerloff will speak about "Power, Freedom, Software", while FSFE Fellowship Coordinator Matthias Kirschner will discuss the PDFreaders campaign.
